value.title: Using ALLEXCEPT vs ALL VALUES
value.excerpt: ALLEXCEPT is a handy DAX function to retrieve all the columns of a table except for some. When used as a CALCULATE modifier, its behavior is less intuitive and might result in inaccurate measures. In this video, we elaborate on the most common mistake when using ALLEXCEPT in CALCULATE. Article and download:
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/DGPvGqzQteM" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Using RELATED and RELATEDTABLE in DAX
value.excerpt: Why and when to use RELATED and its companion function RELATEDTABLE: two common DAX functions that are required when using a row context with relationships. Article and download: https://sql.bi/751669?aff=yt  How to learn DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/guides/dax/?aff=yt The definitive guide to DAX:
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/6_O3UDKOVHo" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Variables in DAX
value.excerpt: Using variables in DAX makes the code easier to read, faster, and easier to debug. Learn how and when to use variables, along with why they are so important in any DAX expression. Article and download: https://sql.bi/760161?aff=yt  How to learn DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/guides/dax/?aff=yt The definitive

value.title: Connect and analyze your Dynamics 365 data​
value.excerpt: Connect and analyze your Dynamics 365 Data​

value.title: Explore data analytics at scale
value.excerpt: Describe data analytics at scale and understand the roles of a data team. Learn about the responsibilities of an enterprise data analyst and what tools are available to build scalable solutions.

value.title: Introduction to end-to-end analytics using Microsoft Fabric
value.excerpt: Discover how Microsoft Fabric can meet your enterprise's analytics needs in one platform. Discover the capabilities Fabric has to offer, understand how it works, and identify how you can use Fabric for your analytics needs.

value.title: Work with Delta Lake tables in Microsoft Fabric
value.excerpt: Tables in a Microsoft Fabric lakehouse are based on the Delta Lake technology commonly used in Apache Spark. By using the enhanced capabilities of delta tables, you can create advanced analytics solutions.

value.title: Conditionally replace values in Power Query in one step
value.excerpt: In todays video I will show you how to conditional replace values in one step without adding new columns in Power Query, Enjoy!! value.title: A TWIST on dynamically filtering visuals by a slicer in Power BI

value.title: Combining refresh and real time with Hybrid Tables in Power BI
value.excerpt: Tired of having to wait for the next refresh to see current data in your Power BI Report? Hybrid Tables is here to help you! Patrick looks at how you can use this feature to have an imported table that uses DirectQuery for the most recent data that hasn't been imported yet. BANANAS!  Announcement Blog:

value.title: Deploy Power BI dataset schema changes WITHOUT refreshing!
value.excerpt: Think you need to always refresh your Power BI dataset even why just adding a measure? Patrick shows how you can deploy schema changes without needing to perform the refresh with Power BI Premium and the ALM Toolkit.  ALM Toolkit: http://alm-toolkit.com/  📢 Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership

value.title: Easily get an access token for the Power BI Embedded Playground
value.excerpt: You need an Embed Token for the Power BI Embedded Playground, but you don't want to write code. Adam shows you how to easily get an access token with no code using PowerShell.  Power BI Embedded Playground - https://microsoft.github.io/PowerBI-JavaScript/demo/ Power BI REST API - https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/power-bi/

We get a lot of questions about what steps need to be taken, what Capacity SKUs are needed and where can they be used. value.title: Power BI Tutorial: Dynamically Filter By Today's Date
value.excerpt: In this Power BI Tutorial, Patrick looks at how to dynamically filter by today's date. Using a date table, you can create a DAX measure that can then be used as a Power BI report-level filter to dynamically filter by today's date within Power BI Desktop.be  LET'S CONNECT!  Guy in a Cube -- https://guyinacube.com

value.title: Power BI Tutorial: Sort By A Measure Not Shown In Visual
value.excerpt: In this Power BI tutorial, Patrick shows you how you can sort by a measure not show in a visual within Power BI Desktop. This was something we didn't even know about until recently and it a great little Power BI nugget. If you wanted to sort by something not shown in a visual, this video is for you!
